typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		CategoryID as integer,
		QuantityPerUnit as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		UnitsOnOrder as integer,
		ReorderLevel as integer,
		Discontinued as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindProducts
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindOrders
NorthwindProducts derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> Products
NorthwindOrders derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> Orders
Products sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_SID as integer,
		Product_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_ID = ProductID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVHubProducts
Orders sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Order_ID = OrderID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVHubOrders
